content: the linen stitch is one of the simplest stitch patterns to master and yields a pretty woven dense fabric the reason it is so simple is that you don t even have to know how to work into the loops of the single_crochet stitches because you will be working into the chain-1 spaces between single_crochet stitches instead this pattern starts off with a photo tutorial on how to make the linen stitch followed by a pattern for a linen stitch dishcloth the pattern can also be used to make a lovie for a special baby i used it in my circus elephant lovie 1 i suggest using cotton if you are going to make dishcloths or any soft yarn if you are going to make a lovie enjoy dedri 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/edward-circus-elephant-lovie-cal
